english.segment1: The message still the same. The prayers always change. A vivacious group of friends, one thing that we share.
english.segment2: End result is life. Forever isnt long. when you cant measure time. Everlasting pride.
english.segment3: Seems youve heard this message. a hundred times before. The point is that we need to live forevermore. No agony in discourse. No wallowing in dread. The choices that you make will matter when youre dead!
english.segment4: Weve always got our friends. to gather in this fight. Theres pressure coming in, from every shape and size.
english.segment5: Now is not the time. to fall bellow the mark. We have to be protective;. we have to stand up strong.
english.segment6: The bridges that were crossing, will never be rebuilt, no time for resentment, or living with our guilt, for starings sake take a glance, at what we can adjust.
